title: When using a phone, can you connect 2 different Bluetooth headphones to one phone? If a song is playing on the phone, will it let 2 different headphones listen to the song? Or can only 1 Bluetooth connect at a time? - Quora

response.answer_text: Multiple Bluetooth headphones can be used at the same time. However the app has to establish a simultaneous stream to both to accommodate dual listeners.(typically because of licensing and copyrighted material) , a single user licensing has limited the number of people allowed to use (listen) , at a use, (too much legal for this reference…), oversimplified explanation why most apps limit to single user. You can write your own app to accomplish the task, ( if you know the protocols and coding language.)

Yes, a mobile phone can be connected to two Bluetooth headsets at the same time. analysisThe Bluetooth inside the headset stores two Bluetooth addresses, but the two cannot transmit data at the same time. The picture above Yan is a mobile phone, the NWZ-A15 is an MP3, and when I listen to the song with MP3, I suddenly come to the phone, and the music follows.
